{{ evento.eventoId }} {{ evento.tema }} {{ evento.local }} {{ evento.dataEvento }} {{ evento.qtdPessoas }} {{ evento.lote }}

Nenhum evento encontrado
import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-eventos', templateUrl: './eventos.component.html', styleUrls: ['./eventos.component.scss'], }) export class EventosComponent { public eventos: any = []; private _filterList: string = ''; hideImage: boolean = false; public get filterList(){ return } constructor(private http: HttpClient) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.getEventos(); } public getEventos(): void { this.http.get('https://localhost:44391/api/Eventos').subscribe({ next: this.handleUpdateEventos.bind(this), error: this.handleError.bind(this), }); } public handleUpdateEventos(response: any): void { this.eventos = response; } public handleError(error: Error): void { console.error(error); } public handleHideImage() { this.hideImage = !this.hideImage; } }
